name: Vive Hand Tracking House
description:
This is a scene which uses hand tracking to allow you to manipulate objects and mess around with the world.

Note: Download coming soon

Before your setup or troubleshooting for SteamVR camera, please make sure:

  • You have updated your SteamVR to latest version in Steam or Viveport.
  • For Vive Cosmos users, update your Vive Console to version newer than v1.0.7.0 is recommended.
  • You have updated your GPU driver to latest version from NVIDIA/AMD offical website.
    • Some drivers from vendor are too old that does not work with SteamVR camera.

You will need to enable your Camera in SteamVR before this can work:

https://hub.vive.com/storage/tracking/misc/steamvr.html
